attributes.title: Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "metrics", "aggs": [], "title": "Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]", "params": {"show_legend": 0, "axis_scale": "normal", "time_field": "", "index_pattern": "filebeat-*", "id": "61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "default_index_pattern": "metricbeat-*", "interval": "", "type": "timeseries", "filter": {"query": "event.dataset :\"azure.activitylogs\" and azure.activitylogs.event_category : \"Alert\"", "language": "kuery"}, "axis_formatter": "number", "series": [{"chart_type": "line", "hide_in_legend": 0, "stacked": "none", "formatter": "number", "separate_axis": 0, "id": "61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "split_mode": "filter", "line_width": 1, "filter": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Activated\"", "language": "kuery"}, "fill": 0.5, "axis_position": "right", "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417"}], "color": "rgba(252,220,0,1)", "point_size": 1}, {"chart_type": "line", "hide_in_legend": 0, "stacked": "none", "formatter": "number", "separate_axis": 0, "id": "5a52f170-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a", "split_mode": "filter", "line_width": 1, "filter": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Resolved\" or azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Succeeded\"", "language": "kuery"}, "fill": 0.5, "axis_position": "right", "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "5a52f171-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a"}], "color": "#68BC00", "point_size": 1}], "axis_position": "left", "isModelInvalid": false, "show_grid": 1, "default_timefield": "@timestamp"}}

attributes.title: Alerts Count [Filebeat Azure]
